User.description: System users with authentication credentials and role-based access permissions
User.businessPurpose: Manages personnel access to the MES system, tracks user activities, and enforces security policies across manufacturing operations
User.updateFrequency: Real-time for status changes, daily batch for HR integration
User.complianceNotes: Contains PII - subject to data privacy regulations. Electronic signatures require 21 CFR Part 11 compliance
User.dataRetention: 7 years after employment termination for audit purposes
User.securityClassification: Confidential - Contains PII and access control data

examples.scenario: Production operator with shop floor access
examples.explanation: Typical production worker with basic manufacturing access
Quality professional with inspection and approval permissions

commonQueries: Find all active users by role for access reviews
Generate user activity reports for compliance audits

WorkOrder.description: Production work orders defining specific manufacturing jobs with materials, operations, and quality requirements
WorkOrder.businessPurpose: Core production planning entity that drives manufacturing execution, resource allocation, and progress tracking through the shop floor
WorkOrder.updateFrequency: Real-time updates as work progresses through manufacturing operations
WorkOrder.complianceNotes: Critical for traceability - changes must be logged for regulatory compliance (AS9100, ISO 9001)
WorkOrder.dataRetention: Permanent retention for traceability and warranty support
WorkOrder.securityClassification: Internal - Production data with competitive sensitivity

examples.explanation: High-priority aerospace component with strict quality requirements

commonQueries: Find all work orders for a specific part number
Generate production status reports for customer delivery
Track work order completion metrics by time period

QualityPlan.description: Quality control plans defining inspection requirements, measurement criteria, and acceptance standards for manufacturing operations
QualityPlan.businessPurpose: Ensures product quality by specifying what to inspect, how to measure, and what constitutes acceptable results during manufacturing
QualityPlan.updateFrequency: Updated when engineering changes occur or quality issues are identified
QualityPlan.complianceNotes: Critical for AS9100 and ISO 9001 compliance - must be approved and controlled
QualityPlan.dataRetention: Permanent retention for regulatory compliance and continuous improvement

examples.scenario: Dimensional inspection plan for precision part
examples.explanation: Critical dimension checks required for aerospace component

commonQueries: Find quality plans requiring measurement equipment calibration
Generate inspection schedules for upcoming production
Track quality plan compliance rates by part family

Equipment.description: Manufacturing equipment and machinery used in production operations with capability and status tracking
Equipment.businessPurpose: Manages shop floor assets including machines, tools, and measurement devices to optimize utilization and ensure capability
Equipment.updateFrequency: Real-time for status updates, periodic for capability assessments
Equipment.complianceNotes: Calibration records required for measurement equipment (ISO 17025). Maintenance logs for safety compliance
Equipment.dataRetention: Equipment lifetime plus 10 years for warranty and safety records
Equipment.securityClassification: Internal - Contains equipment capabilities and performance data

examples.scenario: CNC machining center for precision parts
examples.explanation: Primary machining equipment for aerospace components

commonQueries: Find available equipment for specific operation types
Track equipment maintenance schedules and compliance

Material.description: Raw materials, components, and supplies used in manufacturing with specifications and traceability information
Material.businessPurpose: Manages material inventory, specifications, and traceability to ensure proper materials are used and quality can be tracked
Material.updateFrequency: Real-time for transactions, periodic for specification updates
Material.complianceNotes: Material certificates and traceability required for aerospace and medical applications
Material.dataRetention: Permanent for traceability, certificates kept per regulatory requirements
Material.securityClassification: Internal - Contains supplier and cost information

examples.explanation: High-grade titanium for critical aerospace components

commonQueries: Track material usage by work order for costing
Generate material traceability reports for customer deliveries
